title: Calories in Club Soda
meta_description: Discover calories in club soda—typically 0 per serving—plus full nutrition breakdown, sodium content, and serving tips for mixers.
assumptions: Plain, unflavored club soda (carbonated water with minerals); standard 12 fl oz serving, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, mineral content, and any added flavors; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A 12 fl oz serving of club soda contains 0 calories.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add a squeeze of lime (1 wedge)

faqs.q: How many calories in club soda?
faqs.a: Club soda has 0 calories per 12 fl oz serving.
Yes, plain club soda contains 0 g carbs, sugars, or fiber.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in club soda?
faqs.a: About 75 mg sodium per 12 fl oz serving from added minerals.

faqs.q: Does club soda have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No, it has 0 g protein and 0 g fat.

faqs.q: Can club soda help with hydration?
faqs.a: Yes, it's a zero-calorie alternative to sugary sodas, but carbonation may cause bloating for some.
